title: A Different Kind Of Cannabis ETF With Tim Seymour
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Today's guest on Seeking Alpha's Cannabis Investing Podcast is Tim Seymour, of CNBC Fast Money fame. Tim was an early stage investor and recognized voice in the cannabis industry. He recently launched an actively managed pure play Cannabis ETF, the Amplify Seymour Cannabis ETF (CNBS), where he serves as Portfolio Manager.  During this conversation, Tim weighs in on key macro trends affecting cannabis investors, while also providing a detailed and intimate perspective on a dozen companies in the space.  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
